name: Furtum Sacrum: Dark Time
overview: DARK TIMEThe Count has commissioned the Knight Esquio to clean a section of the Camino de Santiago from all kinds of creatures, witches, dogs, even the Holy Company... Don't forget to save the pilgrims you meet along the way. This seems to be the end of magic times. The Count has the Caballero Esquio clean a stretch of the Camino de Santiago of all kinds of creatures, witches, dogs, even the Holy Company. Do not forget to save the pilgrims you find on the road. This seems to be the end of magic times.
